omVegbilder.image_description: Snøhetta seen from E6 at Hjerkinn.
omVegbilder.text1: Vegbilder (Road Images) is a web-based application for displaying images of the Norwegian road network. The images are taken on a yearly basis and are continuously made available in the application. The application is developed and maintained by the NPRA.
omVegbilder.text2: The NPRA reserve the right to make changes to the application content or to restrict access to the content, if necessary. The data presented in the application can contain errors. The user is personally responsible for how they make use the application and the application data.

bruk.text1: The points on the map represent images. Clicking on the map will start a search for the most recent image taken in the selected point. If an image is found, a preview is shown. If no images are found within 300m of the selected point, the map will zoom in for easier browsing.
bruk.text2: The search field can be used to look for specific location names or road references. Select a specific year to narrow the search. The year selector can also be used to look for images from other years in a chosen image point.
bruk.text3: Click on the image preview to open the image viewer.
bruk.text4: Errors can be reported using this form or in the «More» menu of a selected image.
bruk.text5: Suggestions/feedback can be sent in here

GDPR.text1: To comply with the applicable GDPR regulations, the images are anonymised in an automated process before publication.

statistics.description: The table gives an overview of the number of images available on this application, sorted by year and road category.
statistics.caption: A table En tabell som gir en oversikt over hvor mange vegbilder som er tilgjengelige, kategorisert etter år og vegkategori.
